trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were 3 other sightings in Phoenix on or around March 13th 1997
divs: Sighting Detailsas you might know ,at the end of the 30-minute news run,they often ask you to stay tuned in the next half hour to see more on a breaking news story.well this one said they had some unusual film out of pheonix. a craft which appeared to be about 8 city blocks wide was filmed hovering over the city.and then amazingly they showed the film.i saw a huge craft hovering over a city suburb.then they said more when we come back.of course that never happened.i watched all the films i can find on the pheonix lights,but none are even close to what i saw that night.this film was broadcast,so maybe you know how to find it
